calcio.title: Calcio
calcio.description: Soccer is my favorite sport. I've been playing it since I was a kid. My favorite position is Goalkeeper.

photos.title: FC Bayern Munich
photos.description: Fußball-Club Bayern München e.V., commonly known as FC Bayern München, FCB, Bayern Munich, or FC Bayern, is a German sports club based in Munich, Bavaria.

coding.title: Coding
coding.description: I enjoy code. Making awesome websites and programs is a passion. I am currently a JS dev and I use React.js for most of my projects.

photos.title: Cormac the Druid, work in progress

videGames.title: Video Games
videGames.description: I've been playing Video Games since my Dad bought a Commodore Vic 20 back in the days. I still have fond memories of my games with the Commodore 64, Commodore Amiga and ColecoVision.
